plot: Brooke moves away from her parents and into a condo in Miami Beach, living life on her own for the first time. She enlists the help of two roommates to help make her time in Miami, well spent.
plot_en: Brooke moves away from her parents and into a condo in Miami Beach, living life on her own for the first time. She enlists the help of two roommates to help make her time in Miami, well spent.
plot_es: Brooke moves away from her parents and into a condo in Miami Beach, living life on her own for the first time. She enlists the help of two roommates to help make her time in Miami, well spent.
title: Brooke Knows Best
